media:group.media:description:
CivilNet analyst Eric Hacopian discusses Azerbaijanโs ongoing blockade of Artsakh (Karabakh) and what the international communityโs redlines. Eric reacts to Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyevโs recent interview with Euronews during which he stated that his life mission was to win a war, as well as the recent detention of a Karabakh Armenian who was being transported by the International Committee of the Red Cross to Armenia for medical treatment.

entry.title: Vartan Oskanian: Karabakh's Soviet-era autonomous status must be a negotiation benchmark

media:group.media:title: Vartan Oskanian: Karabakh's Soviet-era autonomous status must be a negotiation benchmark
media:group.media:description:
Armeniaโs former foreign minister Vartan Oskanian (1998-2008), in a video posted on his Facebook page, suggests that the agenda of the talks between Armenia and Azerbaijan must necessarily include the fact that the people of Nagorno-Karabakh had an autonomous status in Soviet times. โThis should become a benchmark for any discussion concerning the future fate of the people of Nagorno-Karabakh.โ

entry.title: The Nubarian Library: Parisโs Hidden Treasure

media:group.media:title: The Nubarian Library: Parisโs Hidden Treasure
media:group.media:description:
Boris Adjemian, the director of the AGBU Nubarian library in Paris, sat down with CivilNet on the sidelines of the Armenian Society of Fellows conference in Dilijan, Armenia, to discuss the AGBU Nubarian library. Established in 1928 in France, the library serves as a major resource for Armenian intellectual life and historical research on the Ottoman Empire and the Armenian diaspora. Adjemian explains the history of the library and how this Armenian institution can share knowledge with other Armenian academic institutions, as well as his own thoughts on how Armenian students can be better equipped to further their careers and studies.

media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีตีกีถ ีธึีธีท ีฐึีกีฟีกึีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีด ีฅีถี ีฃึึีซ ีถีฅึีดีธึีฎีธึีดีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีทีกีฐีกีพีฅีฟ ีง, ึีกีถ ีฃึึีซ ีฐึีกีฟีกึีกีฏีธึีดีจ ีฅึีฏึีซ ีถีฅึีฝีธึีดึ ิณีฌีญีกีพีธึ ีฃีกีถีฃีกีฟีจ ิฑิฑี-ีซ ีขีกึีฑึ ีคึีธึีตึีกีนีกึีถ ีงึ ีีซีถีกีถีฝีถีฅึีซ ีถีกีญีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีฃึึีฅึีจ ิฑิฑี-ีซึ ีกีฆีกีฟีฅีฌีธึ ีฃีกีฒีกึีกึีจ ีฐีกีดีกึีธึีด ีง ีผีซีฝีฏีกีตีซีถ ีธึ ีนีฐีซีดีถีกีพีธึีพีกีฎึ ีีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถ ีึีกีฟีกึีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึีซ ีดีซีปีกีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีกีฝีธึีซีกึีซีกีตีซ 2018-ีซ ีฆีฅีฏีธึีตึีซี ีึีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ึ ีึีฏึีกีซีถีกีตีธึีด ีงีฌีฅีฏีฟึีธีถีกีตีซีถ ึ ีฟีบีกีฃีซึ ีฃึึีซ ิฑิฑี-ีถ ีฆึีธ ีฟีธีฏีธีฝ ีงึ ิปีฝีฏ ีซีีถีน ีบีกีฟีฏีฅึ ีง ีฟีกึีกีฎีกีทึีปีกีถีซ ีกีตีฌ ีฅึีฏึีถีฅึีธึีด ีธึ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีดึ

media:group.media:title: ีีกึีคีฅีถีซีฝีธึีด ีถีธึ ีดีทีกีฏีธึีตีฉ ีง ีฑึีกีพีธึีพีธึีดี ีขีถีกีฏีซีน - ีิปี ีฃีธึีฎีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ
media:group.media:description:
ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีกีดีฅึีฑ ีฃีตีธึีฒีฅึีธึีด ีธึ ึีกีฒีกึีถีฅึีธึีด ีบีกีฟีฝีบีกึีดีกีถ ีญีถีคีซึีจ ีคีฅีผ ีกึีคีซีกีฏีกีถ ีงโค ีกีบีกีฝีฟีกึีกีถีถีฅึีจ ีฏีกีฐีกีพีธึีพีกีฎ ีนีฅีถ, ีซีฝีฏ ีขีถีกีฏีนีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีกีถีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟ ีงึ ิฝีถีคีซึีถ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีขีกีฆีดีกีขีธีพีกีถีคีกีฏ ีธึ ีขีกึีค ีง ีญีธีทีธึ ีฐีกีดีกีตีถึีถีฅึีธึีด, ึ ึีซีถีกีฏี ีีกึีคีฅีถีซีฝีธึีด, ีธึีจ ีฐีกีต-ีกีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีทึีดีกีถ ีฃีฎีซึ 15-20 ีฏีด ีฐีฅีผีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีพึีก ีงึ ีีกีดีกีตีถึีซ ีฅึีซีฟีกีฝีกึีคีถีฅึีจ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีดีซ ึีกีถีซ ีกีดีฝีพีก ีจีถีฉีกึึีธึีด ีกีฏีฟีซีพ ีถีฅึีฃึีกีพีพีกีฎ ีฅีถ ีซึีฅีถึ ีฐีกีดีกีตีถึีซ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีซ ีฌีธึีฎีดีกีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีถีฅึีธึีดี ีกีตีค ีฉีพีธึีด ีกีตีฝ ีฐีกึึีธึีดึ ีีดีกีถ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีง ีจีถีฑีฅีผีฅีฌ ินึีกีถีฝึีกึีฅีถีฝีซ ิปีถีฉีฅึีถีฅีทีถีฌ ีฐีกีฏีกีฏีธีผีธึีบึีซีธีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีถีกีญีกีฑีฅีผีถีกีฎ ีฎึีกีฃีซึีจึ

entry.title: UN chief calls on Azerbaijan to allow aid into Karabakh

media:group.media:title: UN chief calls on Azerbaijan to allow aid into Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
๐Nikol Pashinyan called on Azerbaijan to allow an Armenian government aid convoy to enter Karabakh as a โstep toward commitment to the peace agenda.โ ๐Antรณnio Guterres urged Azerbaijan to lift its blockade of Karabakh and expressed concern over the humanitarian crisis unfolding in the region. ๐Armenia denied entry to U.S. citizen Areni Margossian, the latest case where a member of the opposition Dashnaktsutyun party has been banned from the country. ๐Disney will reportedly not air a miniseries about Mustafa Kemal Atatรผrk, Turkeyโs founding father, on its streaming service after pressure from Armenian interest groups.
